name: CanTANKerous Critters
description:
Summary

Bitgem, purveyors of exquisite game-ready assets, run regular game jam events. In August 2014 I found myself with enough spare time to take part and produce CanTANKerous Critters. The theme for the contest was to make use of the provided assets from Bitgem's collections; some animals, a tank, and some farm scenery. My entry placed 2nd in the competition.

Controls Keyboard & Mouse

W, A, S & D to move the tank
Mouse to aim the turrent
Left click to shoot
Escape to open the menu

XBOX 360 Controller

Left thumbstick to move the tank
Right thumbstick to aim the turrent
Right trigger to shoot
